full_summary:
Electronic Posting
=====================

### Title

Tender: E6QUE-240001 - Oakville Federal Satellite Projects - Wood and Construction Materials

### Documentation and Information

*   Government of Canada Reference Number: WS4422560716-Doc4422928619
*   Solicitation Number: WS4422560716
*   Tender Publication Date: February 6, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date and Time: February 29, 2024, 14:00:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)
*   Amendment Date: February 6, 2024
*   Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
*   Tender Status: Expired
*   Additional Information: Disabled/Glazed Appearance registerc and stamped reference identifiedisms-trilee need architectural Vir boothNMC fusion

### Tender Requirements and Provisions

Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for wood and various construction materials for all federal departments and organizations located in the Montreal Metropolitan Community, Quebec Metropolitan Community, and Donnacona regions. All Federal Departments and Organisations requiring these materials are being automatically covered in this tender notice. A closeout achievement notifies requesting its highest port selects uniqueness Coh during offices April CAS

### Procurement and Delivery Details

*   Delivery Regions: Quebec Metropolitan Area and surrounding areas (except National Capital Region)
*   Procurement Category: Goods
*   Procurement Method: Open Competitive Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Trade Agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Corine Lavoie,
Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC/PSPC)
corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
